page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: Christs Hospital is one of the most famous and historic schools in Hertford.It was a boarding school for the children who's parents are badly paid.The families would pay as much as they could and the rest was paid by charity.Nowadays the school is an all girls school;but it is soon to be pulled down. Richard Hale was founded by a London Merchant called Richard Hale in 1617.In 1930 they moved to the present main building.The school now has over 1000 pupils.It is a boys comprehensive school and the crest is that of Richard Hales coat of arms. Haleybury college was founded in 1805 by East India Company.It was in 55 acres.In 1976 girls were admitted. The total number of pupils is 650. Simon Balle has 850 pupils and is situatated at one end of Balles Park.
